mapper.insert: insert into member (m_id, m_name, m_pw, gender, m_company, m_dept, m_is_smoke, m_address, m_cellphone) values (#{m_id}, #{m_name}, #{m_pw}, #{gender}, #{m_company}, #{m_dept}, #{m_is_smoke}, #{m_address}, #{m_cellphone})
mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum rnum,a.* from (select * from member
order by m_id desc) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select d.driver_seq, m.m_id, m.m_address, m.m_company, m.m_name, m.m_dept, d.driver_depart_location, d.driver_depart_time, a.ad_approve from driver d, member m, approve_driver a where d.m_id = m.m_id and a.m_id = m.m_id and a.ad_approve = 'Y' and m.m_company = #{m_company} order by d.driver_depart_time, d.driver_seq asc) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
insert into approve_driver (ad_seq, ad_license_img, m_id) values (seq_approve_driver.nextval, #{ad_license_img}, #{m_id})
mapper.insert: insert into passenger (passenger_seq, m_id, passenger_depart_location, passenger_depart_time, driver_seq) values (seq_passenger.nextval, #{m_id}, #{boardLoct}, #{boardTime}, #{driver_seq})
mapper.select: select m_address from member where m_id = #{m_id}
select driver_seq from passenger where is_approve = 'W' and is_deletion = 'N' and m_id = #{m_id}
select m_id from driver where driver_seq = #{driver_seq}

select m_id, m_evl from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from member order by m_evl desc)a)
where rnum <= 5
select count(*) from passenger where is_approve = 'W' and is_deletion = 'N' and m_id = #{m_id}
select m.m_id, m.m_name, m.gender, ad.ad_license_img, ad.ad_regdate, ad.ad_detail from member m, approve_driver ad where m.m_id = ad.m_id and ad.ad_approve ='W' order by ad.ad_regdate desc
